wikipedia_page.main: Patricia Josephine Ferguson (born 24 September 1958, Glasgow) is a former Scottish Labour Party politician who was the Member of the Scottish Parliament (MSP) for Glasgow Maryhill constituency from 1999 until 2011 and for Glasgow Maryhill and Springburn from 2011 until 2016.

response: Butler is married to Patricia Ferguson, a fellow Labour MSP and former Minister for Tourism, Culture and Sport.
